suggest.meta_keywords: Edge Application, Application Accelerator, Advanced Cache Key, Cache by Query String, Cache Settings, Query Strings, Cache by Cookie, Cache Policies, Azion Console, Real-Time Manager
suggest.meta_description: Enhance your Edge Application with Application Accelerator by configuring Advanced Cache Key settings for Query Strings and Cookies, efficiently managing cache policies using Azion tools.

current.meta_description: Learn how you can improve the performance of your application and APIs by configuring content cache policies based on the Query String or Cookie of a page using Application Accelerator for Edge Application.
current.meta_keywords: edge computing, Query Strings, api, Application Accelerator, cache
